culturalSensitivityGuidelines.description: Comprehensive guidelines for respectful cultural content development and implementation

principles: Some knowledge is not for public sharing

sacred.approach: Provide general understanding with clear boundaries about participation

restricted.approach: Acknowledge existence but respect knowledge boundaries

sensitive.approach: Provide cultural context while respecting privacy

forbidden.approach: Do not include in educational content

implementationGuidelines: Always indicate when content requires elder guidance
Include respectful acknowledgment of knowledge limits
Connect learners with appropriate cultural mentors

elders.behavior_expectations: Show deference through body language and tone
elders.interaction_protocols: Wait to be addressed, seek permission before speaking
elders.photography: Always ask permission before photographing elders

in_laws.avoidance_customs: Certain in-law relationships have interaction restrictions
in_laws.respect_terms: Specific address terms required for different in-law relationships
in_laws.ceremony_roles: In-laws have specific roles in family ceremonies
in_laws.conflict_resolution: Special protocols for handling in-law disagreements

spirits_ancestors.ceremony_protocols: Understanding when and how spiritual matters are discussed
spirits_ancestors.modern_adaptation: How traditional beliefs coexist with modern life

ceremonies.participation_levels: Different levels of participation based on relationship to family
ceremonies.appropriate_behavior: Understanding when to speak, when to observe, when to participate
ceremonies.gift_obligations: Traditional gift-giving expectations for different ceremonies
ceremonies.dress_codes: Appropriate attire for different types of ceremonies

dialectRespect.principle: All regional variations are valid and valued
dialectRespect.approach: Present Standard Shona while acknowledging regional richness
implementation: Include regional variation notes where appropriate
Avoid privileging one dialect over others
Present variations as cultural richness, not deviations
Connect regional differences to cultural history

urbanRuralDynamics.urban_adaptations: How Shona culture adapts in urban settings
urbanRuralDynamics.rural_traditions: Traditional practices maintained in rural areas
urbanRuralDynamics.respectful_presentation: Avoid urban bias or rural stereotypes

modernTraditionalBalance.continuity_values: Core values that persist across changes
modernTraditionalBalance.diaspora_adaptations: How culture adapts in diaspora communities

Include cultural context for all vocabulary
Provide learning pathways with appropriate progression
review_process: Regular updates based on user feedback

progressive_disclosure: Gradually introduce more complex cultural concepts
Provide clear guidance at each level

elderAdvisoryBoard.compensation: Appropriate recognition and compensation for elder knowledge

Regular updates on cultural enhancement progress
